sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnemplyrscrtyestbs ( scrty_dtrmn_trget_id , mber_ty_code , author_code ) VALUES ( #scrtyDtrmnTrgetId# , #mberTyCode# , #authorCode# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnemplyrscrtyestbs SET scrty_dtrmn_trget_id = #scrtyDtrmnTrgetId# , mber_ty_code = #mberTyCode# , author_code = #authorCode# WHERE 1 = 1 AND scrty_dtrmn_trget_id = #scrtyDtrmnTrgetId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnemplyrscrtyestbs WHERE 1 = 1 AND scrty_dtrmn_trget_id = #scrtyDtrmnTrgetId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT scrty_dtrmn_trget_id , mber_ty_code , author_code FROM comtnemplyrscrtyestbs WHERE scrty_dtrmn_trget_id = #scrtyDtrmnTrgetId#

SELECT scrty_dtrmn_trget_id , mber_ty_code , author_code FROM comtnemplyrscrtyestbs WHERE 1=1
scrty_dtrmn_trget_id = #searchKeyword#
mber_ty_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY scrty_dtrmn_trget_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnemplyrscrtyestbs WHERE 1=1
scrty_dtrmn_trget_id = #searchKeyword#
mber_ty_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
